MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_Install_Support: Install and Uninstall, Downloadable Web Executable contains 1.44mb Installer and Cabinets

English.Keywords: Ident, Ident deamon, Ident Protocol, Identity Protocol, Authentication Protocol, deamon, server, service
English.Char_Desc_80: IdentProtocol is a windows service that listens for incomming ident requests.
English.Char_Desc_250: IdentProtocol is a windows service that listens for incomming ident requests and responds with the proper info. It has a INI file for setting up the options and has no interface.
English.Char_Desc_450: IdentProtocol is a windows service that listens for incomming ident requests and responds with the proper info. It has a INI file for setting up the options and has no interface. The service itself works inconjunction with itself when more then one is running with in the same intranet and any requests to even misdirected will be correctly relayed to the outside inquery.
English.Char_Desc_2000: IdentProtocol is a windows service that listens for incomming ident requests and responds with the proper info. It has a INI file for setting up the options and has no interface. The service itself works inconjunction with itself when more then one is running with in the same intranet and any requests to even misdirected will be correctly relayed to the outside inquery. This service responds with the Windows User account and optionally the computer name to the requester. It can also be set to act indenpendant or even not at all unless a spoecified program you supply is running.
